formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Meeting cost (one-off): \\[ C = \sum_{i=1}^{n}\Big( h_i \cdot \underbrace{r_i \cdot (1+\frac{o}{100})}_{\\text{loaded hourly}} \cdot \underbrace{\frac{t + p + v}{60}}_{\\text{hours per attendee}} \Big) \\] Where annualized cost is \\( C_{annual} = C \times f \\).
